recommendations: Ankur Gupta “I had recruited Samarth almost 3 years ago at Wodehouse Capital and it has been a pleasure working with him since. Samarth has a wealth of experience and all the necessary skill-set required to be a successful Investment Banker. What Samarth also has in spades is an unfaltering attitude, grit, determination and dedication to his work which is a trait that is commonly amiss, which makes him an asset to the team and to any client. I am confident that he will do well in life and will always be an asset to his organization. I wish him all the best for his future”

Kunal Kapadia “I haven't seen a such a great passionate person for finance like Samarth in my life. His passion and love for finance and economics makes him different from other. Having studied for 2 years and working in tandem for some projects with him I learnt a lot; not just finance but also other managerial skills. He is simply an exceptional personality with big heart who always helps other. His attitude and approach towards this area will definitely put him into the great heights.”
